Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
